pages: Once upon a time there were the worst Minecraft players. They sacrificed the Herobrine of cows and sheep ... this continued until the Great Horse came into our world! And he enlightened the unclean !!! And they began to love and honor him. The apostles Horsin came after, among them was Dyukha, who gave the peasants a letter, Horney, who gave love to the world, Cricus, who gave people creativity! Among them was an apostle - a traitor!

He was evil and insidious, his name was Lucifer, oh, not that, his name was El Redstoniano! He brought the desire to speed up minecraft into the world! 
 To be continued ...
